name: Aster10ds
description:
controls are  WASD for movement, Left Mouse Button for shooting, 1, 2, 3, and 4 to switch to gem weapons, space to switch back to normal gun.

destroy asteriods and collect gems.

there's no sound for now because im lazy, the options and credits buttons don't work yet.

press backslash for scuffed pixelated effect.

esc quits from the main menu or sends you to the main menu from the game.

also i use windows so i have no idea if the mac install will work.
